item.title: Academics
item.description: You can see my CV here. And you can contact me at rosss23@mcmaster.ca Doctoral Candidate I am a doctoral candidate in philosophy at McMaster University under the supervision of Dr. Alex Klein. Dissertation Research: How far can we tolerate or encourage differences between scientific representations? When do differences become conflicts that researchers need to resolve? Some scientific pluralists walk a tightrope, downplaying as much conflict as they can while insisting on objective standards for truth and justification.

item.title: Stephen Ross
item.description: I’m a Canadian philosophy student nearing the end of my PhD. I’m also a classical musician who plays the piano. This website is part calling card, part oasis for serious leisure (mainly reading and writing). What will you write about? There will be two streams: philosophy, and an eclectic hodgepodge of my other interests. The philosophy stream will record thoughts which aren’t quite publishable but I still find worth sharing. I’m interested in questions about inquiry, logic and history, digested with the help of the philosophy of science and pragmatism.
